info.title: Docusign
info.description: Docusign enables organizations to create, commit to and manage their agreements across the entire agreement lifecycle. Customers can accelerate revenue, reduce risk and unlock value from the agreements that run their business.

parameters.name: certificate
parameters.description: When set to false, the envelope signing certificate is removed from the download.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: Provide specific document Id or use an output format from the dropdown
enum: Archive : Get ZIP archive with documents and COC
Certificate : Get only certificate of completion as pdf
Combined with COC : Get all documents as single pdf
Combined without COC : Get all documents as single pdf
Portfolio : Get envelope documents as a PDF Portfolio

put.description: This action resends a Docusign envelope or sends a reminder to recipients who need to sign a Docusign agreement based on a provided EnvelopeId.

parameters.name: reminderEnabled
parameters.description: When set to false the reminders are disabled. Default is false

parameters.name: reminderDelay
parameters.description: Add number of days after which recipient receives reminder email.

parameters.name: reminderFrequency
parameters.description: Add number of days between reminder emails.

parameters.name: expireAfter
parameters.description: Add number of days before expiry.

get.description: Returns the related records of the of the CRM sales entities.

get.description: This action brings back relevant Docusign envelopes based on envelope status, date range, recipient name, recipient email address, envelope title, document name, or envelope custom field value. The output is the title, description, Envelope ID, document names, sender names, envelope status, status date, date sent, and a URL of the envelope which can be used as a link to view the envelope in Docusign.

parameters.name: recipientName
parameters.description: This action lists envelopes based on recipient name

parameters.name: recipientEmailId
parameters.description: This action lists envelopes based on recipient email id

parameters.name: envelopeTitle
parameters.description: This action lists envelopes based on email subject of the envelope

parameters.name: customFieldName
parameters.description: This action lists envelopes based on a name of its custom fields

parameters.name: customFieldValue
parameters.description: This action lists envelopes based on a value of its custom fields

parameters.name: envelopeStatus
parameters.description: This action lists envelopes based on status of the envelope

parameters.name: folder_ids
parameters.description: This action lists envelopes based on various states of the envelope

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: This action orders envelopes based on specific property

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Enter start date-time in the pattern or format: 2017-05-02T01:44Z. Do not provide any value until user provides the value.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Enter end date-time in the format: 2017-05-02T01:44Z. Do not provide any value until user provides the value.

customFields.description: Key-value pairs representing the custom fields for this envelope (where key is the field name, and value is the field value).

tabs.description: Key-value pairs representing the tabs for this recipient (where key is the field name, and value is the field value).
